column2: "I'm pretty sure I'm ready to go it alone next time. I owe you big time!"
"But what about those Dragonkin? It seems like almost all of them have gone nuts."
"I know ARKS is looking into why, but isn't there something we could do to help them in the meantime?"
"Well, anyway. See ya, partner. I hope you'll be around the next time I need you!"
